title: Stations
text:
#library(devtools)
#install_github("andrew-loh/neaSG", force = TRUE)


pacman::p_load(tmap, sf, tidyverse, sfdep, mapview, leaflet.providers, neaSG)


stn <- get_weatherstns()


glimpse(stn)

Rows: 62
Columns: 5
$ id                 <chr> "S77", "S109", "S117", "S64", "S90", "S114", "S50",…
$ device_id          <chr> "S77", "S109", "S117", "S64", "S90", "S114", "S50",…
$ name               <chr> "Alexandra Road", "Ang Mo Kio Avenue 5", "Banyan Ro…
$ location.latitude  <dbl> 1.29370, 1.37640, 1.25600, 1.38240, 1.31910, 1.3800…
$ location.longitude <dbl> 103.8125, 103.8492, 103.6790, 103.7603, 103.8191, 1…



stn_sf <- st_as_sf(stn, 
                   coords = c("location.longitude", "location.latitude"), crs = 4326)


glimpse(stn_sf)

Rows: 62
Columns: 4
$ id        <chr> "S77", "S109", "S117", "S64", "S90", "S114", "S50", "S107", …
$ device_id <chr> "S77", "S109", "S117", "S64", "S90", "S114", "S50", "S107", …
$ name      <chr> "Alexandra Road", "Ang Mo Kio Avenue 5", "Banyan Road", "Buk…
$ geometry  <POINT [°]> POINT (103.8125 1.2937), POINT (103.8492 1.3764), POIN…



tmap_mode("view")

tmap mode set to interactive viewing

tm_basemap("CartoDB.Positron") +
  tm_shape(stn_sf)+
  tm_dots(col = "black", size = 0.1)
